about_the_game:
You are placed in a abandon forest filled with beings that were once human and other creatures called aliens. The Alien boss resides in a house you must find in the forest and you must capture what it is guarding. Will you escape and bring humanity closer to ending the epidemic? Use stealth tactics such as crouching, hiding behind walls and trees, and also a weapon to complete your mission. Their is a indicator in the game that lets you know when you've been spotted.
In this First-Person experience you play as Greg who is a retired soldier who was taken away from his farm to combat aliens and zombies. He is angry and determined to defeat the enemies and return to his former life but be careful, every sound and step you make could make the enemies aware of you!
Will you also find the weapon to make stealth less of a risk for zombies and aliens?

In this First-Person experience you play as Greg who is a retired soldier who was taken away from his farm to combat aliens and zombies. He is angry and determined to defeat the enemies and return to his former life but be careful, every sound and step you make could make the enemies aware of you!

name: Hospital Aliens 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 5700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You must find two items in a land of Aliens. Use stealth tactics and a weapon to complete your mission.
